name: Vasil Abdul Razak
position: Software Engineer | Backend | Elixir | Phoenix | Golang
about: Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience building robust, enterprise-level applications using Elixir and Phoenix. Proven ability to design and implement complex features, including role-based access control, dynamic form generators, and multi-tenant architectures. Strong collaborator, code reviewer, and mentor, fostering a positive team environment. Skilled in leveraging Elixir's functional programming paradigm, Ecto's data modeling, and Guardian's authentication/authorization solutions for creating scalable and maintainable software.
